description.name: PaymentHood
description.tagline: All-in-one payment orchestration platform unifying multiple gateways into one integration.
description.long: PaymentHood unifies multiple payment gateways into a single integration, enabling businesses to accept global payments securely without complex development. This WHMCS plugin takes under five minutes to set up and supports one-time and subscription payments with automated payment verification.
features: Unified payment orchestration - one API for multiple gateways
Multi-currency and global payment methods support
Advanced fraud detection and smart routing
OAuth2 secure activation with sandbox and live modes
